45   
46          if self._session.has_endpoint('image'):

49                  self.glance = yakumo.glance.v1.Client(self, **kwargs) 
50              elif self._session.config['image_api_version'] == '2': 
51                  import yakumo.glance.v2 
52                  self.glance = yakumo.glance.v2.Client(self, **kwargs) 
53   
54          if self._session.has_endpoint('volume'):
